text: Labo bayilabo uMvelinqangi abeke umusa phezu kwabo abaphuma phakathi kwabaphrofethi enzalweni ka-Adamu kanye neyalabo esabathwala kanye noNowa (ngomkhumbi) nenzalo ka-Abrahamu no-Israyeli kanye neyalabo esabahola futhi sabakhetha okwakuthi uma befundelwa amavesi onomusa bawe phansi ngokuzithoba futhi bakhale
